name: Katara - ATLA
description: Please give it a try and provide any feedback you may have. I want to improve my workflow for better results, I've already had some great tips!

modelVersions.name: V9
modelVersions.description:
Skipping to V9. I will lose track of what's what if I don't. Versions 2-8 are not released and likely won't be.

Skin might be too light in color. Working out how to process image before training. Want to get a solid workflow that requires minimal effort on my part. I essentially used the same images from V1 (in fact, I removed some) because I don't want to go find more still images. I did do some things with those images though. Also reduced the token count. The background is more flexible and I've managed to get her wearing different clothes. Still has a heavy bent toward her traditional outfit and she usually always has her mother's necklace.

meta.prompt: masterpiece, Katara_V9_Shurik, dark skin, hiking in the mountains wearing a (yellow hardhat) and overalls
